title: Fast Response VA
job_overview:
Approximate 3 months selection for Full time employment.

To assist Director towards CEO journey.
Director has multiple businesses and property to manage.

Looking for VA:
- Competent
- Meticulous
- Quick response
- Keep track of activities for Director Task List
- Assist on delegations on Administrative work
- A touch on Director exercise regime
- 4hours/day = 28hours/week
